Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/1/1966 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/1/1966 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Injured on 6/23/1967 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1968...
Released by Cleveland on 7/31/1970...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/5/1971 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 5/6/1971 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/1971 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/15/1973 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Baltimore on 4/1/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/1/1979 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/22/1980 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/14/1980 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Drafted in 5th round, 95th overall pick, by Boston in 1985...
Injured on 9/8/1988 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/20/1989 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/20/1990 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1991, off Billy Taylor (NYY)...
